facilities.name: Mech Printer (fixed)
facilities.description: A very old printer that has been repaired and now functions normally.
facilities.notes: Allows the printing of mechs, weapons and systems.

facilities.name: Materials Reclaimer
facilities.description: An array of machinery used to deconstruct waste materials into component parts for reuse.
facilities.notes: Allows destroyed or damaged mechs, weapons and other machines to be recyclyed for materials.

facilities.name: Munitions Fabricator
facilities.description: A specialized printer used to produce mech-sized ammunition.
facilities.notes: Allows the printing of special ammunition.

facilities.name: Holding cell
facilities.description: A storeroom repurposed into a makeshift holding cell.
facilities.notes: Allows a single captive to be held with very low chance of escape.

defenses.name: Machine Gun Nests
defenses.description: A number of man-portable machine guns stationed in a series of makeshift dugouts made from sandbags at the edge of Blue Haven.
defenses.notes: Provides +1 defense. Provides light covering fire when fighting near the settlement. Must be manned.

defenses.name: Stationary Cannons
defenses.description: A variety of mech scale weapons that have been mounted onto stationary emplacements at the edge of Blue Haven.
defenses.notes: Provides +2 defense. Provides covering fire when fighting near the settlement. Must be manned.

defenses.name: Automated Cannons
defenses.description: A variety of mech scale weapons that have been fitted with simple FoF and target acquisition systems.
defenses.notes: Provides +3 defense. Provides covering fire with +1 Accurracy when fighting near the settlement.

defenses.name: Motion Sensors
defenses.description: A relay of bog-standard motion sensors placed several kilometers out. Prone to false positives from wildlife.

personnel.name: Laura Stahl
personnel.description: A talented mechanical engineer who grew up on New Samona. She has a particular hatred for house Harken.
personnel.notes: Provides the settlement with 2 blocks of construction or production time each downtime.

personnel.name: Andrea Morris
personnel.description: A young reporter with contacts all over Radahn. An expert at finding people and information.
personnel.notes: Provides +1 e-defense. Provides the settlement with 1 block of recruitment time each downtime.

personnel.name: Boris Stelov
personnel.description: A grey bearded ex-soldier. Claims he spent most of his life as part of a rebel organization fighting for planetary independance.
personnel.notes: Provides +1 defense. Allows training of higher tier militia.
